vypr | Ruby on Rails developer | REMOTE + UK travelling | Full time |https://www.vyprclients.com/

You'll be working with a team of 4 developers and a dedicated QA. This is a key role in the company, working alongside the Director of Product and the full development team in the continual improvement of the Vypr platform. There are clear opportunities for both career and personal progression as the business continues to grow.

What the job involves: New feature design and implementation, Bug fixes,Code review, Maintaining and refactoring our codebase, Maintaining and improving the deployment pipeline, Maintenance and improvements to the mobile API, Close collaboration and remote pair programming.

This role offers competitive remuneration and the potential to join the company Enterprise Management Incentive scheme to take a stake in the business

Sent CV and Cover letter to dominic.travers@vyprco.com
